subject: Football
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The average price of a game-day ticket on the secondary market was said to be $10,466.11, which is over four times the price of last year’s ticket.
snippet: The average price of a game-day ticket on the secondary market was said to be $10,466.11, which is over four times the price of last year’s ticket.
